Problem.info1: IIn the education system, more than 90% of students are impacted by school and university closures. The map is a depiction of countries that are experiencing lockdown in terms of a countrywide or a localized lockdown. The education sector and an estimated 1.5 billion students were affected worldwide due to these lockdowns. Learning has been disrupted due to the pandemic, and there is a requirement for a new education model.
Problem.info2: Solution: Online and immersive digitalization of Content, Curriculum, Coaching, and Classroom.
Problem.card1p: Open Enterprise supports best in sociocratic management.
Problem.card2p: Open Enterprise supports best in sociocratic management.
Problem.card3p: Open Enterprise supports best in sociocratic management.

Inspiration.info1: Theoretical knowledge online is what most universities have achieved, but practical training online so far seems unique. We are building tools to auto-generate (convert) text-based content to video-based online content with an extension towards gamification and immersive techniques for advanced pieces of training.
Inspiration.info2: Vision to ensure learning continuity for all.
Inspiration.info3: Standardized education and access to all with equal opportunities to educational processes.

item4.title: Standardize curriculums

item6.title: Immersive ecosystem
item6.description: One world education and immersive with equal opportunities for all.

Steps: Digital Automated Content Platform that teachers use to create engaging learning content using the Video Creation tool
Students get the digital lectures, courses for self-paced, yet guided virtual coaching
Anyone can clone content and create more learning material from previous creators
Public knowledge is free, you only pay for private. The private revenues are shared back to free contributors
